import React, {useState} from 'react' import {FaUserPlus, FaSearch, FaBars} from 'react-icons/fa' import {BsBell, BsCaretDownFill} from 'react-icons/bs' import './Navbar.css' const Navbar = () => { const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = useState(false); window.onscroll = () =>{ setIsScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? false : true); return () => (window.onscroll = null); }; console.log(isScrolled); return (
Home Series Movies New and Popular My list

) } export default Navbar
